name: MARS 1.0
description:
Kickstarter 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/zipzygames/mars-10survival-game2023-human-a...

First of all, this game will be launched on the biggest platforms like Stream PS4/5 IOS Android Twitch MI store. Zipzgame is using Unreal Engine 5 to produce the demo that will be officially released on the website and all the gaming platforms in Jan 2022.

The name of the Game is "MARS 1.0" in which humans send their AI machine to Mars to study the habitat and creatures in MARS. Initially, the AI will first start with Machine learning in which they will learn about all the creatures and who is the dominant character in its dynasty and then after the study is completed in MARS then Machines will send Data to the Earth server. The most turning point will begin when the queen of the dynasty got kidnapped, therefore with the help of the hair of the girl one powerful machine name "Puissance" will convert its character same as the girl then the actual gameplay began. This will be a survival game in which one character with Axe will fight with monsters.
